articles.author: Mike Coppinger
articles.title: Ryan Garcia floors Javier Fortuna three times in dominant knockout win
articles.description: Ryan Garcia dropped Javier Fortuna three times, culminating in a devastating sixth-round knockout victory in their bout Saturday night.
articles.content:
Following a disappointing performance in April, Ryan Garcia impressed against a far better opponent on Saturday with a sixth-round knockout of Javier Fortuna in a 140-pound bout in Los Angeles.

articles.title: 'We did it': Fred Kerley leads first American sweep of 100 meters at world championships in 31 years
articles.description: Fred Kerley led the first American sweep of the 100 meters at the worlds in 31 years Saturday, barely edging teammates Marvin Bracy and Trayvon Bromell to stamp a red-white-and-blue exclamation point on the first championships ever held in the U.S.

articles.title: LeBron James' 42-point show lights up Drew League; Kyrie Irving no-shows
articles.description: LeBron James scored 42 points in his return to the Drew League on Saturday, while Kyrie Irving's expected appearance in a separate game didn't happen.
articles.content:
LOS ANGELES -- LeBron James scored 42 points in a successful return to the Drew League while teaming up with DeMar DeRozan for a 104-102 win in L.A.'s famed pro-am basketball league on Saturday.

articles.title: Norway's Espen Jorstad outlasts Adrian Attenborough to win World Series of Poker
articles.description: Norway's Espen Jorstad won the World Series of Poker Main Event for $10 million in earnings at the Bally's Event Center in Las Vegas on Saturday.
articles.content:
Norway's Espen Jorstad won the World Series of Poker Main Event for $10 million in earnings at the Bally's Event Center in Las Vegas on Saturday.

articles.title: Surging Seattle Mariners outlast Texas Rangers in 10 innings, extend winning streak to 13 games
articles.description: The dancing, prancing Seattle Mariners stretched their winning streak to 13 games, defeating the Texas Rangers 3-2 on Saturday, moving closer to the club-record 15-game winning streak set in their last playoff season of 2001.
articles.content:
ARLINGTON, Texas -- J.P. Crawford hit an RBI single in the 10th inning and the Seattle Mariners stretched their winning streak to 13 games, defeating the Texas Rangers 3-2 on Saturday.

articles.title: Justin Verlander gets league-leading 12th win, passes Curt Schilling, Bob Gibson on all-time strikeouts list
articles.description: Houston Astros' 39-year-old Justin Verlander collected his MLB-leading 12th win in Saturday's 5-0 win over the Oakland Athletics and moved past Curt Schilling and Bob Gibson into 14th place on the all-time strikeouts list.
articles.content:
HOUSTON -- After collecting his MLB-leading 12th win Saturday, Justin Verlander wasn't ready to reflect on how far he's come this season.

articles.title: From the All-Star Game to Cooperstown? Hall of Fame tiers for every 2022 MLB All-Star
